case: CP Printer Carrying Case DCC-CP3 CP Printer Carrying Case DCC-CP2
batterypack: Yes, optional NB-CP2L (Approx. 36 Postcard size prints per full charge. Requires Charge Adapter CG-CP200)¹
camera: USB type A port on printer, Wi-Fi (PictBridge via WLAN - DPS over IP compatible)
powersupplybatterychargers: AC Adapter CA-CP200B, Charge Adapter CG-CP200 (for Battery Pack NB-CP2L)
computer: USB mini-B port on printer, Wi-Fi (IEEE802.11 b/g)
lcdmonitor: 6.8 cm (2.7") Colour TFT viewer with multi-language user interface and tilt mechanism (Languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Thai, Hindi, Vietnamese, Malaysian, Japanese, Portuguese)
dimensions: 178.0 x 127.0 x 60.5 mm (printer only without protrusions)
